title: Mad Love
lyrics:
Let 'em tell us stories
As we're lying in the fields
And watch a bird soar above
Let 'em tell us of love and loss
How we'll live and how we'll die
Cos they say he once was

Somebody with a black suit

And good shoes

And a perfect smile

It makes me wanna ask



Was it in a

Mad love

And a big fights

So was it in a

Small change

And the passing of day

So was it in a

Giving up

And a giving on

No was it in a

Mad love

So was it in a

Mad love

So was it in a

Mad love

And a big fights



Let 'em tell us stories

As we're lying in the field

And watch the clouds pass above

How paper burns and pictures fade

Only melody remains

Sure enough he laughs as if he knows

Makes me wanna ask



Was it in a

Mad love

And a big fights

So was it in a

Right words

At the right times

Was it in a

Giving up

And a moving on

No was it in a

Mad love

So was it in a

Mad love

So was it in a

Mad love

So was it in a

Little things

We all want



We all want

We all want



Was it in a

Mad love

And a big fights

So was it in a

Small change

And the passing of day

So was it in a

Giving up

And a giving on

No was it in a

Mad love

So was it in a

Mad love

So was it in a

Mad love

So was it in a

Mad love

So was it in a

Mad love

And a big fights
